thread.section_title: Blumberg Excelsior, Inc. Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Blumberg Excelsior, Inc. | www.blumberg.com
thread.title: Doretta Boehm
thread.title_full: Blumberg Excelsior, Inc. reviewed by Doretta Boehm

author: Doretta Boehm
title: Doretta Boehm
text:
When the signing date for my LP was bumped up Blumberg Excelsior created a customized corporate kit for me over night! I ordered Thursday late afternoon, from California, way after NY business hours. My beautiful Kit was delivered Friday morning. Insane!
It is unusual in this day and age to actually have any type of transaction performed smoothly. Everything about my transaction with Blumberg was straightforward, simple, and as promised. I still can't believe they had this custom corp kit to me in time for my meeting! I will be a client for life!
